OrgName.entry: PARSON CROSS TAI CHI HEALTH GROUP

Desc.entry: A series of exercises or movements which refresh, strengthen and energise. Its most evident characteristics are slowness, stillness, lightness, relaxation of the muscles and concentration of the mind. Benefits general health including breathing (asthma) and movement. Open to people aged 18 years and over. Beginners welcome and first session is free as a taster.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - TAI CHI, QI GONG AND CAPOEIRA
